text: "The Heart of Rock & Roll – The Best of Huey Lewis and The News" is a 1992 compilation album by Huey Lewis and the News. It went to number 23 in Australia and the United Kingdom, number 3 in New Zealand, number 40 in Japan and number 39 in Switzerland. It features tracks from their five of their studio albums and two from the Back to the Future soundtrack. ==Track listing== == References == Category:1992 albums Category:Huey Lewis and the News
title: The Heart of Rock & Roll – The Best of Huey Lewis and The News
